title: Ruling on an impurity that has dried up without being washed, does it become pure over time? |Assim
transcript: her third question was about an impurity so there's a drop of urine on the carpet or drops of urine and after like five months six months nobody washed it is it after so much time considered to be pure the answers no it is still nudges but it's dry so the impurity is still there and it is not uh leaving after an expiry date etc
